thread.title: BRIEF-Canadian Pacific Q1 Adjusted Earnings Per Share C$2.70

title: BRIEF-Canadian Pacific Q1 Adjusted Earnings Per Share C$2.70
text:
April 18, 2018 / 8:05 PM / Updated 14 minutes ago BRIEF-Canadian Pacific Q1 Adjusted Earnings Per Share C$2.70 Reuters Staff 
April 18 (Reuters) - Canadian Pacific Railway Ltd: 
* CP REPORTS FIRST QUARTER REVENUE OF $1.66 BILLION; POSITIVE MOMENTUM HEADING INTO SECOND QUARTER * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE C$2.41 
* QTRLY VOLUMES AS MEASURED BY REVENUE TON-MILES INCREASED 6 PERCENT AND CARLOADS INCREASED 4 PERCENT 
* CANADIAN PACIFIC - “THIS WAS A CHALLENGING QUARTER”, AS CO FACED EXTREME WEATHER, UNPRECEDENTED DEMAND, SPECIFICALLY IN NORTHERN REACHES OF NETWORK 
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW C$2.68, REVENUE VIEW C$1.68 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
